LS Test
001101 00000 00001 00000 00000 000001 #ori r1 = r0 or 1 //Set up all of the resgisters as I want them
001101 00000 00010 00000 00000 000100 #ori r2 = r0 or 4
001101 00000 00011 01001 00000 001001 #ori r3 = r0 or 9
001101 00000 00100 00110 00000 011111 #ori r4 = r0 or 31
101000 00010 00100 00000 00000 000000 #sb from r4 to r2+0
101001 00001 00011 00000 00000 000001 #sh from r3 to r1+1
100000 00010 01110 00000 00000 000000 #lb from r2 + 0 to r14
000000 01110 00000 01110 00000 100101 #or r14 = r14 or 0
100001 00001 01111 00000 00000 000001 #lh from r1 + 1 to r15
000000 01111 00000 01111 00000 100101 #or r15 = r15 or 0
